## Ingredients

* 12 - 14 oz Cellentani or another fun shape pasta
* 3/4 cup italian style dressing
* 1/4 mayonnaise
* 1/2 tsp black pepper
* 9 - 12 slices bacon, crispy and crumbled
* 2 cups chopped cooked chicken ([poached](https://rmflight.github.io/recipes/posts/2021-11-06-poached-chicken-breast-instant-pot/index.html) would work nicely)
* 8 oz cherry tomatoes, halved
* 1 cup cubed Muenster or Monterey Jack cheese
* 1 medium red pepper, chopped
* 1 avocado, chopped

## Directions

* Cook **12 - 14 oz** pasta, rinse under cold water and drain.
* Whisk together **3/4 cup** italian dressing,  **1/4 cup** mayonnaise and **1/2 tsp** black pepper in a large bowl.
* Stir in cooked pasta, **2 cups** chopped chicken, **9-12 slices** of bacon, **8 oz** cherry tomatoes, **1 cup** chopped cheese, **1** chopped red pepper, **1** chopped avocado.

Serve immediately, or chill covered up to 4 hours.

Source: Allrecipes magazine.
